page.title: 13Health Care in Ballantrae.
page.content: Two doctors with dispensing practice, live in Ballantrae,practice is Colmonell,Pinwherry,Barrhill.District Nurse covers area,lives in Pinwherry, makes house calls on infirm elderly, bathing them and attending dressings. They have chiropody monthly,Day Care Centre in Girvan weekly,WRVS deliver Meals on Wheels to them.Most children here born maternity hospital Irvine. Babies immunised against Poliomyelitis Pertussis,Diphtheria,Tetanus. Sulphonamides,Antibiotics still used. No dentist,no fluoridation of public water supply,3% chlorine added by drip or gas.There is high incidence of respiratory,cardiac,carcinoma problems Women have cervical smear tests at Well-Woman clinics Girvan or Stranraer There is national compaign to stop smoking and alchohol and drug abuse.
